title: Coordinator, Production Management, Live Action - Japan
overview: The coordinator, production management, live action - Japan, is responsible for managing internal and third-party co-productions of Netflix Originals titles, establishing relations with vendors and staff/crew, meeting production management deadlines, and supporting the production management team with administration and best practices.
description:
We are seeking an experienced Coordinator, Production Management to help manage both internal and third-party co-productions of Netflix Originals titles from a physical production perspective. Responsibilities include establishing and curating vendor & staff/crew relations, ensuring all Production Management deadlines are established and met, assisting the Production Management team with administration, and supporting/suggesting best practices from pre-production through delivery. Together, this team is responsible for supervising all aspects of the physical production processes across the Netflix Originals Live Action Japan slate.
 
The Opportunity
Netflix is the world's leading streaming entertainment service with 230+ million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.
 
The Role
A successful candidate will be self-motivated, proactive, quick-thinking, flexible, able to pivot when necessary, thorough and able to juggle multiple and diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and an unwavering attention to detail at all times. This is a demanding and fast moving position that requires someone who is a proactive and positive thinker, and able to exercise good judgment and initiative while working with a high volume production slate.

extras.title: Specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
content: Set up, schedule and coordinate initial kick off and ongoing production meetings for internal and partner-produced co-productions
Assist with identification and curation of experienced, high-quality production staff and crew
Coordinate the onboarding process for production companies and freelance producers to the Netflix ecosystem, tools, and resources
Update and maintain inward and outward-facing production resources and documents
Research, curate, and develop relationships with vendors, while continually analyzing cost efficiencies
Assist productions and executives in planning and coordinating travel
Provide translation and interpretation support
Any other duties as necessary to support the productions and the department

extras.title: Qualifications:
content: 3+ years of working experience ideally in an environment that required attention to detail , proactiveness and a hospitality mindset
Strong passion for the entertainment industry, especially for Japanese live action content
Strong curiosity to learn and continue learning the most up to date production process and equipments
Ability to handle a fast paced environment and simultaneously support several projects
Ability to respond after hours for important, timely or urgent matters
Team-player who operates in a fast-paced, team-oriented and cross-functional setting including communicating with other overseas teams
Selfless with an ability to help other colleagues and seek what is best for Netflix and not yourself
Ability to be discreet and maintain confidential information
Understanding of how to prioritize and respond accordingly while being an effective communicator
Tech savvy and proficiency in Google Ecosystem (including Google Docs, Sheets, Slides, Mail and Drive) is a plus
Willingness to take educated risks and think out of the box
Willingness to travel across the region to help set up productions
Excellent written and verbal communication in English, and fluency in Japanese
